title: Ex Princess
description: Kaylen: A fresh start—that’s what my father is calling it.But it’s hard to start things over when the whole world knows your story.I’m the former princess whose mother had a not so graceful tumble off the royal stage.It was one of the biggest scandals to ever hit the royals. My family turned their backs on me—including the man I thought was my father. I was completely alone.Until my real father reached out to me.He’s the principal of one of the most prestigious schools in Australia, Silverwood Academy, where status and power mean everything.I left one royal world because I didn't belong and stepped into another one that I don't want to be part of. I just wish people would get the message and leave me alone.Hunter:Convincing a girl to hook up with me until graduation?It’s the easiest ten grand I’ll ever make.There isn’t a girl in this entire school who’d turn me down.Except maybe the new chick, Kaylen.She gives new meaning to the word princess.Lucky for me I love a challenge.
author: Missy Johnson
